text: Ra jaba timro baccaharu yuvavastha prapta gardachan taba uniharula'i avasyaka cha ki anumati li'era (timro kothama) pravesa garne garun junaprakarale uniharubhanda agadika manisaharule anumati lindai gareka thi'e. Yasaprakara allahale timro nimti aphna ayataharu spasta pardacha. Allaha ramrari jannevala, suksmadarsi cha
